attributes.action: Recommend that Her Majesty confer a George Cross or other gallantry medal to the Police Officers whose selfless actions on Friday 29th June 2007 ensured that the car bomb on Haymarket, London, was made safe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The press reports suggest that the first Police Officers on the to arrive at the scene put their own lives at substantial risk by entering the live car bomb on Haymarket, and removing or disconnecting the potential source of detonation.  The selflessness of this act which potentially saved many lives, and certainly prevented damage to property should be recognised with an appropriate gallantry medal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
